member.name: M:Gurux.Net.GXNet.Send(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary:
Sends data asynchronously.
No reply from the receiver, whether or not the operation was successful, is expected.
member.param: Data to send to the device.
member.remarks:
Reply data is received through OnReceived event.
If data is send synchronously use Synchronous
